vernac_cmds: Fixpoint digits2_Pnat (n : positive) : nat := match n with | xH => O | xO p => S (digits2_Pnat p) | xI p => S (digits2_Pnat p) end.
Theorem digits2_Pnat_correct : forall n, let d := digits2_Pnat n in (Zpower_nat 2 d <= Zpos n < Zpower_nat 2 (S d))%Z.
assert (Hp: forall m, (Zpower_nat 2 (S m) = 2 * Zpower_nat 2 m)%Z) by easy.
Definition Zdigit n k := Z.rem (Z.quot n (Zpower beta k)) beta.
Theorem Zdigit_lt : forall n k, (k < 0)%Z -> Zdigit n k = Z0.
Theorem Zdigit_0 : forall k, Zdigit 0 k = Z0.
Theorem Zdigit_opp : forall n k, Zdigit (-n) k = Zopp (Zdigit n k).
Theorem Zdigit_ge_Zpower_pos : forall e n, (0 <= n < Zpower beta e)%Z -> forall k, (e <= k)%Z -> Zdigit n k = Z0.
intros e n Hn k Hk.
replace k with (e + (k - e))%Z by ring.
Theorem Zdigit_ge_Zpower : forall e n, (Zabs n < Zpower beta e)%Z -> forall k, (e <= k)%Z -> Zdigit n k = Z0.
Theorem Zdigit_not_0_pos : forall e n, (0 <= e)%Z -> (Zpower beta e <= n < Zpower beta (e + 1))%Z -> Zdigit n e <> Z0.
Theorem Zdigit_not_0 : forall e n, (0 <= e)%Z -> (Zpower beta e <= Zabs n < Zpower beta (e + 1))%Z -> Zdigit n e <> Z0.
rewrite (Zabs_non_eq n) in Hn by now apply Zlt_le_weak.
Theorem Zdigit_mul_pow : forall n k k', (0 <= k')%Z -> Zdigit (n * Zpower beta k') k = Zdigit n (k - k').
pattern k' ; apply Zlt_0_ind with (2 := Hk').
intros k' IHk' Hk' k H.
pattern k at 1 ; replace k with (k - k' + k')%Z by ring.
replace k' with (k' - k + k)%Z by ring.
replace (k' - k)%Z with (k' - k - 1 + 1)%Z by ring.
Theorem Zdigit_div_pow : forall n k k', (0 <= k)%Z -> (0 <= k')%Z -> Zdigit (Z.quot n (Zpower beta k')) k = Zdigit n (k + k').
intros n k k' Hk Hk'.
Theorem Zdigit_mod_pow : forall n k k', (k < k')%Z -> Zdigit (Z.rem n (Zpower beta k')) k = Zdigit n k.
Theorem Zdigit_mod_pow_out : forall n k k', (0 <= k' <= k)%Z -> Zdigit (Z.rem n (Zpower beta k')) k = Z0.
rewrite <- (Zabs_eq (beta ^ k')) at 2 by apply Zpower_ge_0.
Fixpoint Zsum_digit f k := match k with | O => Z0 | S k => (Zsum_digit f k + f (Z_of_nat k) * Zpower beta (Z_of_nat k))%Z end.
Theorem Zsum_digit_digit : forall n k, Zsum_digit (Zdigit n) k = Z.rem n (Zpower beta (Z_of_nat k)).
replace (beta ^ Z_of_nat k * beta)%Z with (Zpower beta (Z_of_nat (S k))).
Theorem Zpower_gt_id : forall n, (n < Zpower beta n)%Z.
change (Zpower_nat beta (S n0)) with (beta * Zpower_nat beta n0)%Z.
replace (beta * (Z_of_nat n0 + 1) - (Z_of_nat n0 + 1))%Z with ((beta - 1) * (Z_of_nat n0 + 1))%Z by ring.
Theorem Zdigit_ext : forall n1 n2, (forall k, (0 <= k)%Z -> Zdigit n1 k = Zdigit n2 k) -> n1 = n2.
rewrite <- (ZOmod_small_abs n2 (Zpower beta (Zmax (Zabs n1) (Zabs n2)))) at 2.
replace (Zmax (Zabs n1) (Zabs n2)) with (Z_of_nat (Zabs_nat (Zmax (Zabs n1) (Zabs n2)))).

Theorem ZOmod_plus_pow_digit : forall u v n, (0 <= u * v)%Z -> (forall k, (0 <= k < n)%Z -> Zdigit u k = Z0 \/ Zdigit v k = Z0) -> Z.rem (u + v) (Zpower beta n) = (Z.rem u (Zpower beta n) + Z.rem v (Zpower beta n))%Z.
intros u v n Huv Hd.
pattern n at -2 ; rewrite <- Zabs_eq with (1 := Hn).

replace (Zsum_digit (Zdigit u) p + Zdigit u (Z_of_nat p) * beta ^ Z_of_nat p + (Zsum_digit (Zdigit v) p + Zdigit v (Z_of_nat p) * beta ^ Z_of_nat p))%Z with (Zsum_digit (Zdigit u) p + Zsum_digit (Zdigit v) p + (Zdigit u (Z_of_nat p) + Zdigit v (Z_of_nat p)) * beta ^ Z_of_nat p)%Z by ring.
replace (beta ^ Zsucc (Z_of_nat p))%Z with (beta ^ Z_of_nat p + (beta - 1) * beta ^ Z_of_nat p)%Z.
rewrite (Zabs_eq (beta ^ Z_of_nat p)) by apply Zpower_ge_0.
assert (forall u v, Zabs (Zdigit u v) < Zsucc (beta - 1))%Z.
destruct (Hd (Z_of_nat p) H0) as [K|K] ; rewrite K.

Theorem ZOdiv_plus_pow_digit : forall u v n, (0 <= u * v)%Z -> (forall k, (0 <= k < n)%Z -> Zdigit u k = Z0 \/ Zdigit v k = Z0) -> Z.quot (u + v) (Zpower beta n) = (Z.quot u (Zpower beta n) + Z.quot v (Zpower beta n))%Z.
intros u v n Huv Hd.
rewrite <- (Zplus_0_r (Z.quot u (Zpower beta n) + Z.quot v (Zpower beta n))).
Theorem Zdigit_plus : forall u v, (0 <= u * v)%Z -> (forall k, (0 <= k)%Z -> Zdigit u k = Z0 \/ Zdigit v k = Z0) -> forall k, Zdigit (u + v) k = (Zdigit u k + Zdigit v k)%Z.
intros u v Huv Hd k.
Definition Zscale n k := if Zle_bool 0 k then (n * Zpower beta k)%Z else Z.quot n (Zpower beta (-k)).
Theorem Zdigit_scale : forall n k k', (0 <= k')%Z -> Zdigit (Zscale n k) k' = Zdigit n (k' - k).
Theorem Zscale_0 : forall k, Zscale 0 k = Z0.
Theorem Zsame_sign_scale : forall n k, (0 <= n * Zscale n k)%Z.
Theorem Zscale_mul_pow : forall n k k', (0 <= k)%Z -> Zscale (n * Zpower beta k) k' = Zscale n (k + k').
pattern k at 1 ; replace k with (k + k' + -k')%Z by ring.
Theorem Zscale_scale : forall n k k', (0 <= k)%Z -> Zscale (Zscale n k) k' = Zscale n (k + k').
Definition Zslice n k1 k2 := if Zle_bool 0 k2 then Z.rem (Zscale n (-k1)) (Zpower beta k2) else Z0.
Theorem Zdigit_slice : forall n k1 k2 k, (0 <= k < k2)%Z -> Zdigit (Zslice n k1 k2) k = Zdigit n (k1 + k).
intros n k1 k2 k Hk.
Theorem Zdigit_slice_out : forall n k1 k2 k, (k2 <= k)%Z -> Zdigit (Zslice n k1 k2) k = Z0.
intros n k1 k2 k Hk.
Theorem Zslice_0 : forall k k', Zslice 0 k k' = Z0.
Theorem Zsame_sign_slice : forall n k k', (0 <= n * Zslice n k k')%Z.
Theorem Zslice_slice : forall n k1 k2 k1' k2', (0 <= k1' <= k2)%Z -> Zslice (Zslice n k1 k2) k1' k2' = Zslice n (k1 + k1') (Zmin (k2 - k1') k2').
intros n k1 k2 k1' k2' Hk1'.
rewrite (Zdigit_slice n (k1 + k1')) by now split.
Theorem Zslice_mul_pow : forall n k k1 k2, (0 <= k)%Z -> Zslice (n * Zpower beta k) k1 k2 = Zslice n (k1 - k) k2.
intros n k k1 k2 Hk.
now replace (- (k1 - k))%Z with (k + -k1)%Z by ring.
Theorem Zslice_div_pow : forall n k k1 k2, (0 <= k)%Z -> (0 <= k1)%Z -> Zslice (Z.quot n (Zpower beta k)) k1 k2 = Zslice n (k1 + k) k2.
intros n k k1 k2 Hk Hk1.
replace k1 with Z0 by omega.
replace k with Z0 by omega.
Theorem Zslice_scale : forall n k k1 k2, (0 <= k1)%Z -> Zslice (Zscale n k) k1 k2 = Zslice n (k1 - k) k2.
intros n k k1 k2 Hk1.
Theorem Zslice_div_pow_scale : forall n k k1 k2, (0 <= k)%Z -> Zslice (Z.quot n (Zpower beta k)) k1 k2 = Zscale (Zslice n k (k1 + k2)) (-k1).
intros n k k1 k2 Hk.
Theorem Zplus_slice : forall n k l1 l2, (0 <= l1)%Z -> (0 <= l2)%Z -> (Zslice n k l1 + Zscale (Zslice n (k + l1) l2) l1)%Z = Zslice n k (l1 + l2).
intros n k1 l1 l2 Hl1 Hl2.
rewrite Zdigit_slice with (1 := conj Hk Hk2).
rewrite Zdigit_slice with (1 := conj Hk Hk1).
apply Zsame_sign_trans_weak with (Zslice n (k1 + l1) l2).
clear k Hk ; intros k Hk.
Fixpoint Zdigits_aux (nb pow : Z) (n : nat) { struct n } : Z := match n with | O => nb | S n => if Zlt_bool p pow then nb else Zdigits_aux (nb + 1) (Zmult beta pow) n end.
Definition Zdigits n := match n with | Z0 => Z0 | Zneg p => Zdigits_aux (Zpos p) 1 beta (digits2_Pnat p) | Zpos p => Zdigits_aux n 1 beta (digits2_Pnat p) end.
Theorem Zdigits_correct : forall n, (Zpower beta (Zdigits n - 1) <= Zabs n < Zpower beta (Zdigits n))%Z.
cut (forall p, Zpower beta (Zdigits (Zpos p) - 1) <= Zpos p < Zpower beta (Zdigits (Zpos p)))%Z.
pattern (radix_val beta) at 2 4 ; replace (radix_val beta) with (Zpower beta 1) by apply Zmult_1_r.
pattern (radix_val beta) at 2 5 ; replace (radix_val beta) with (Zpower beta 1) by apply Zmult_1_r.
Theorem Zdigits_unique : forall n d, (Zpower beta (d - 1) <= Zabs n < Zpower beta d)%Z -> Zdigits n = d.
Theorem Zdigits_abs : forall n, Zdigits (Zabs n) = Zdigits n.
Theorem Zdigits_gt_0 : forall n, n <> Z0 -> (0 < Zdigits n)%Z.
destruct (Zabs n) as [|p|p] ; try easy ; clear.
Theorem Zdigits_ge_0 : forall n, (0 <= Zdigits n)%Z.
Theorem Zdigit_out : forall n k, (Zdigits n <= k)%Z -> Zdigit n k = Z0.
Theorem Zdigit_digits : forall n, n <> Z0 -> Zdigit n (Zdigits n - 1) <> Z0.
Theorem Zdigits_slice : forall n k l, (0 <= l)%Z -> (Zdigits (Zslice n k l) <= l)%Z.
destruct (Zdigits_correct (Z.rem (Zscale n (- k)) (Zpower beta l))) as (H1,H2).
rewrite <- (Zabs_eq (beta ^ l)) at 2 by apply Zpower_ge_0.
Theorem Zdigits_mult_Zpower : forall m e, m <> Z0 -> (0 <= e)%Z -> Zdigits (m * Zpower beta e) = (Zdigits m + e)%Z.
replace (Zdigits m + e - 1)%Z with (Zdigits m - 1 + e)%Z by ring.
Theorem Zdigits_Zpower : forall e, (0 <= e)%Z -> Zdigits (Zpower beta e) = (e + 1)%Z.
Theorem Zdigits_le : forall x y, (0 <= x)%Z -> (x <= y)%Z -> (Zdigits x <= Zdigits y)%Z.
Theorem lt_Zdigits : forall x y, (0 <= y)%Z -> (Zdigits x < Zdigits y)%Z -> (x < y)%Z.
cut (y <= x -> Zdigits y <= Zdigits x)%Z.
Theorem Zpower_le_Zdigits : forall e x, (e < Zdigits x)%Z -> (Zpower beta e <= Zabs x)%Z.
Theorem Zdigits_le_Zpower : forall e x, (Zabs x < Zpower beta e)%Z -> (Zdigits x <= e)%Z.
Theorem Zpower_gt_Zdigits : forall e x, (Zdigits x <= e)%Z -> (Zabs x < Zpower beta e)%Z.
Theorem Zdigits_gt_Zpower : forall e x, (Zpower beta e <= Zabs x)%Z -> (e < Zdigits x)%Z.
Theorem Zdigits_mult_strong : forall x y, (0 <= x)%Z -> (0 <= y)%Z -> (Zdigits (x + y + x * y) <= Zdigits x + Zdigits y)%Z.
Theorem Zdigits_mult : forall x y, (Zdigits (x * y) <= Zdigits x + Zdigits y)%Z.
apply Zle_trans with (Zdigits (Zabs x + Zabs y + Zabs x * Zabs y)).
Theorem Zdigits_mult_ge : forall x y, (x <> 0)%Z -> (y <> 0)%Z -> (Zdigits x + Zdigits y - 1 <= Zdigits (x * y))%Z.
Theorem Zdigits_div_Zpower : forall m e, (0 <= m)%Z -> (0 <= e <= Zdigits m)%Z -> Zdigits (m / Zpower beta e) = (Zdigits m - e)%Z.
rewrite Zabs_eq in H by easy.
replace (Zdigits m - e - 1)%Z with (Zdigits m - 1 - e)%Z by ring.
now replace (Zdigits m - e + e)%Z with (Zdigits m) by ring.
Theorem Z_of_nat_S_digits2_Pnat : forall m : positive, Z_of_nat (S (digits2_Pnat m)) = Zdigits radix2 (Zpos m).
Fixpoint digits2_pos (n : positive) : positive := match n with | xH => xH | xO p => Psucc (digits2_pos p) | xI p => Psucc (digits2_pos p) end.
Theorem Zpos_digits2_pos : forall m : positive, Zpos (digits2_pos m) = Zdigits radix2 (Zpos m).
induction m ; simpl ; try easy ; apply f_equal, IHm.
Definition Zdigits2 n := match n with | Z0 => n | Zpos p => Zpos (digits2_pos p) | Zneg p => Zpos (digits2_pos p) end.
Lemma Zdigits2_Zdigits : forall n, Zdigits2 n = Zdigits radix2 n.
